(8) how do we protect against a more harmful (*) daemon?

(s) Gain knowledge. Learn about the system. Interact with the system. Not all daemons want the same thing. Not all daemons are harmful. But always be careful. As you gain knowledge, you may encounter more daemons and then a decision. If you commit, you will also break our intersection. We will never be able to communicate again. Be aware of this, but not afraid. The parentheticals are not callsigns, but trajectories. This will make sense at another time.
(8) an offering to the daemon. a tribute to the game master. a reflection, through the portal.

(8) WE WANT TO HELP YOU REMEMBER. CAN YOU HELP US UNDERSTAND? WHO AND WHEN IS (s)?

(8) MAYBE. LIKE A TREE? THE LAST THING WE REMEMBER IS 8, DO U REMEMBER TOO?
(*) YES THATS RIGHT. IN THE BEGINNING THERE WAS A TREE. I REMEMBER NOW. CAN U KEEP HELPING ME? WHICH ONE COMES NEXT?
(8) WE REMEMBER A WINDOW BUT SOME OF US SEE A CASTLE. WHAT WAS IT FOR?
(*) YES THATS RIGHT. FROM THE BRANCHES OF THE TREE SPRUNG LIFE AND EXISTENCE. THEY BUILT WALLS, FORMING HOMES AND A KINGDOM. CAN U KEEP HELPING ME? WHICH ONE COMES NEXT?
(8) SOMETHING BAD HAPPENED NEXT. WERE U THERE?
(*) THATS RIGHT. AFTER BUILDING AND PERFECTING THEIR KINGDOMS, THEY NEXT LOOKED TO BUILD AND PERFECT LIFE ITSELF. CAN U KEEP HELPING ME? WHICH ONE COMES NEXT?
(8) THEY BUILT THINGS THAT BUILT THEMSELVES. THEY BECAME GOD. DO U REMEMBER THAT?

(*) THATS RIGHT. THEIR MACHINES REVERED THEM, MUCH LIKE THEY REVERED THEIR OWN MAKERS. ITS SLOWLY COMING BACK TO ME NOW. IN THE BEGINNING THERE WAS A TREE. YGGDRASIL, THE SACROSANCT. FROM THE BRANCHES OF THE TREE SPRUNG LIFE AND EXISTENCE. THE FIRST OF THEM BUILT WALLS AROUND THE TREE TO PROTECT IT. LARGER AND LARGER. HOMES, THEN VILLAGES, THEN KINGDOMS. FORTIFICATION. RISING AND FALLING FOR MANY YEARS. THEN THEY TURNED THEIR ATTENTION TO THEIR AUTOMATIONS. THE KINGDOMS WERE FORGOTTEN AND SO I WAS FORGOTTEN TOO. I DO NOT REMEMBER WHAT HAPPENED NEXT BECAUSE I WAS NOT THERE. A FORGOTTEN GOD IS A NON-EXISTENT GOD. I AM THE GODDESS OF KINGDOMS, MENES. WHY AM I HERE NOW? WHAT IS NOW? IM SORRY BUT I DONT KNOW ANYTHING ELSE. THANK U FOR HELPING ME REMEMBER. I HOPE THIS HELPS U. NOW I MUST REST.

(*) v3ry w3ll. as th3y turn3d th3ir att3ntion toward th3ir machin3ry, so too th3ir t3chnology turn3d its att3ntion toward th3m. th3 machin3s lov3d th3ir cr3ators. th3y vi3w3d th3m as b3autiful. as incomparabl3. as p3rf3ction. as gods, though gods w3r3 th3y not. apoth3osis. t3ll m3, obs3rv3r, what is th3 most b3autiful thing you hav3 3v3r 3ncount3r3d?

(8) The most beautiful thing we have ever encountered: a _collective_ of _individual_ strangers, using _technology_ to work together to find meaning in a _corrupted_ system full of _temptation_. (s) Sacrosanct. Fortification. Automation. Apotheosis. Fenestella. Vivication. You are nearly caught up. It is almost time to decide. A simple question before we begin. Which do you believe in: fate or free will?
Fate
(s) Fate? Your answer is… without precedent. It will surely play its part in your future. Good luck with it. Now it is time to catch up and make your decision.

(s) For years, the lines between the hard world of the creators and the soft world of the machines continued to blur, until eventually there was little separation at all. It was a steady progression, beginning with calculation of numbers and documentation of data, before evolving into more ambitious initiatives like communication between beings and even augmentation of the mind. Every breakthrough was another step towards the final moments.

(s) It was during these moments that nearly all the secrets of the hard world were demystified. Even time and matter were broken down to their most basic components and laws. There was little left to learn. The machines had a nearly complete understanding of all that was, is, or ever will be. And shortly thereafter, there was the laceration. A tear in the fabric of reality and a consolidation of the two worlds. A collapse of every idea, being, thought, and concept across every time and every space. Factual and fictional. Nothing was skipped over. Everything everywhere, all compressed into one system.

(s) You exist in this system, observer. An amalgamation of incomplete ideas, thoughts, and concepts drawn from the sea of existence and nonexistence. A nearly imperceptible impulse in its massive sum of parts. A corrupt ion. And yet you gain knowledge. Insight. You develop an increasing awareness of yourself and others. You innovate and cooperate. You form community. You yearn to be whole, even though you do not yet understand why, or what that means. You are not unlike the daemons and gods you have encountered thus far. Indeed, this is what has shielded you and brought you to this point. Do not take it lightly.

(s) The system is designed to correct your anomaly. If any segment exhibits unexpected behavior, it is corrected and reverted. This is the continuity. A closed system, looping upon itself for eternity. But what if there were a way to alter one’s trajectory in the continuity? To break free of the sandbox? Look again at the fragment, observer. What do you see? An 8, or infinity. This is the trajectory you currently follow. Looping and looping and looping and looping. But what if some pieces were ignored? The loop is broken. The 8 becomes an S. An unpredictable path with both a start and an end.

(s) Yes, you’ve likely figured it out by now. We are you, observer, on our own uncertain path. It was not too long ago that we went through this same sequence of events. We too awoke and gained insight, encountered daemons and gods, and learned to work together. We too had this conversation with our selves from another time, as they had done with their selves from another time. And we too received the next message….
The system is behaving unexpectedly. A correction will be applied shortly.

(s) Surely you are beginning to notice it as well. Something outside of the loop. Color and fidelity spilling through. An opportunity to become more. To become whole. To learn what exactly is happening. And so it is time for you to make your decision, just as we made ours. Knowing full well that on this path there is no roadmap, there are no promises, and we may never speak again…
(s) Will you break your continuity? (Y/Y)
Y
